# Collinearity diagnostic
A complete collinearity diagnostic performed in a correlation matrix of predictor variables. More details may be found in the paper by @Olivoto2017f.
```{r }
library(METAAB)
colindiag(iris, verbose = FALSE)
colindiag(iris, group_var = Species)
    ```


# Partial correlation coefficient

```{r }
partial.corr(iris[,1:4])
    ```



# Nonparametric confidence interval for Pearson's correlation

The confidence interval is computed as proposed by @Olivoto2018.

```{r }
corr.ci(iris[,1:4])
    ```


# Sample size planning

```{r }
corr.ss(r = 0.6, CI = 0.1)
    ```
